title: 就黎受英國電台訪問 應該講咩好

replies.msg:

replies.msg: Are they trying to prank you mate? Where do you live in Wales?
你係到打定你想同人地講咩先啦巴打

The BBC Radio 4’s Today programme will be at Cardiff Uni tomorrow to talk about the UK elections.

They also want to speak to some Hong Kong students with a view to coming on the show, it will be about the protests (I'm not sure what exactly they'll be asking).

If you are interested in watching or speaking on the show, please be at the Haydn Ellis building tomorrow at 7:30am sharp, as the show is a live morning broadcast from 6am-9am. This is an amazing opportunity as it is a BBC news programme with an audience of 7 million people. 

However, the person mentioned that you may not be able to get on because they are covering the elections mainly (so eg. it may take up all the time) so please be prepared for that.

如果問倒啲好尖銳，不利我方嘅問題，唔好踩入去，永遠都spin番去政府責任、獨裁、警暴上，
再重申五大訴求
